TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ListControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl implements class System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl, class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public MustInherit Class ListControl Inherits DataBoundControl Implements IEditableTextControl
public ref class ListControl abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataBoundControl, System::Web::UI::IEditableTextControl

summary.span: 用作定义所有列表类型控件通用的属性、方法和事件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class that defines the properties, methods, and events common for all list-type controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例抽象类不能直接创建。An instance of the abstract class cannot be created directly. 相反，此类由其他类继承，如， ， ，和类，以提供通用的基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by other classes, such as the , , , and classes, to provide common basic functionality. 属性类允许你指定的要填充列表控件的数据源。The properties of the class allow you to specify the source of the data to populate the list control. 使用属性来指定要绑定到该列表控件的数据源。Use the property to specify the data source to bind to the list control. 如果数据源包含多个表，使用属性来指定要使用的表。If the data source contains more than one table, use the property to specify the table to use. 你可以将绑定到数据源中的不同字段和通过设置列表控件中项的属性和属性，分别。You can bind different fields in the data source to the and properties of the items in the list control by setting the and properties, respectively. 通过设置格式的列表控件中的每个项可以通过显示文本属性。The text displayed for each item in the list control can by formatted by setting the property. 列表控件中显示的所有项都存储在集合。All items displayed in the list control are stored in the collection. 你可以以编程方式指定或使用来确定列表控件中选定项的索引属性。You can programmatically specify or determine the index of a selected item in the list control by using the property. 可以通过使用访问的选定项的属性属性。The properties of the selected item can be accessed by using the property. 类提供发往服务器之间更改列表控件中的选定内容时引发的事件。The class provides the event, which is raised when the selection in the list control changes between posts to the server. 这使您可以为此事件提供自定义处理程序。This allows you to provide a custom handler for this event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 类实现接口，以便派生列表类型控件可以在其他控件的模板模式下使用。The class implements the interface so that derived list-type controls can be used in the template mode of other controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何中选择项目控件。The following code example demonstrates how to select items in a control. 在文本框中找到该项目，如果选定了项，并指出所选的项的名称显示一条消息。If the item is found in the text box, the item is selected and a message is displayed stating the name of the selected item. 如果未找到该项目，未选定任何项，并指出找不到该项目显示一条消息。If the item is not found, no item is selected and a message is displayed stating that the item was not found. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/CS/listcontrolselectedvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/VB/listcontrolselectedvaluevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Applies HTML attributes and styles to render to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用要插入的其他属性和样式到派生自的控件的输出流类。The method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles into the output stream for controls that are derived from the class.

span.span: The method overrides the method.

public: virtual property bool AppendDataBoundItems { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否在绑定数据之前清除列表项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether list items are cleared before data binding.

value.span: 如果不在绑定数据之前清除列表项，则为 ；如果在执行数据绑定之前清除项集合，则为 。

span.span: if list items are not cleared before data binding; otherwise, , if the items collection is cleared before data binding is performed.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你将项添加到对象，然后进行数据绑定。The property allows you to add items to the object before data binding occurs. 后的数据绑定、 对项集合包含两个数据源中的项和以前添加的项。After data binding, the items collection contains both the items from the data source and the previously added items. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据绑定项和不是数据绑定中的项包括控件。The following code example demonstrates how to include both data-bound items and items that are not data-bound in a control. 在事件，一个项添加到集合和属性设置为`true`。In the event for the , one item is added to the collection and the property is set to `true`. 然后，控件绑定到控件。Then, the control is bound to a control. 生成控件包含的数据绑定项和已单独添加的项。The resulting control contains both the data-bound items and the item that was added individually. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlAppendDataBoundItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAppendDataBoundItems/CS/AppendItemsCs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlAppendDataBoundItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAppendDataBoundItems/VB/AppendItemsVb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool AutoPostBack { get; set; }
.property instance bool AutoPostBack
Public Overridable Property AutoPostBack As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoPostBack { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户更改列表中的选定内容时是否自动产生向服务器的回发。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a postback to the server automatically occurs when the user changes the list selection.

value.span: 如果只要用户更改列表中的选定内容就自动产生向服务器的回发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a postback to the server automatically occurs whenever the user changes the selection of the list; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`如果服务器需要使其立即捕获所选内容。Set this property to `true` if the server needs to capture the selection as soon as it is made. 例如，可以根据用户的选择列表控件中自动填充在网页上其他控件。For example, other controls on the Web page can be automatically filled depending on the user's selection from a list control. 此属性可以用于允许基于用户从列表中选择的网页上其他控件的自动填充。This property can be used to allow automatic population of other controls on the Web page based on a user's selection from a list. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用为控件。The following example demonstrates how to enable for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAutoPostBack/CS/ListControlAutoPostBackcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlAutoPostBack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlAutoPostBack/VB/ListControlAutoPostBackvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置指示在单击从 类派生的控件时是否执行验证的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when a control that is derived from the class is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否执行验证时控件被单击。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定与验证关联的输入的控件是否控件在页上通过了所有验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 默认情况下，单击控件派生自类不会导致页验证。By default, clicking a control that is derived from the class does not cause page validation. 若要控制时执行页验证派生自单击类，请将设置属性`true`。To perform page validation when the control that is derived from the class is clicked, set the property to `true`. 时的值属性设置为`true`，你还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件进行验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

[!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string DataTextFormatString { get; set; }
.property instance string DataTextFormatString
Public Overridable Property DataTextFormatString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DataTextFormatString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置格式化字符串，该字符串用来控制如何显示绑定到列表控件的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatting string used to control how data bound to the list control is displayed.

value.span: 绑定到控件的数据的格式化字符串。

span.span: The formatting string for data bound to the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性提供一个列表控件中的项的自定义显示格式。Use the property to provide a custom display format the items in a list control. 数据格式字符串包含的形式，以冒号分隔的两个部分 { `A` : `Bxx` }。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }. 例如，{0: f2} 的格式设置字符串的格式单元格以显示大量固定点两位小数。For example, the formatting string {0:F2} would format the cell to display a fixed point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值仅可以设置为 0，因为在每个单元格只有一个值。This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要显示中的值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见的格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|采用固定格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|以常规格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 下表包含示例的格式设置字符串和结果。The following table contains examples of formatting strings and the results. 它假定标准英语设置。It assumes standard English settings. |数字值Numeric Value|格式字符串Format String|结果Result| |-------------------|-------------------|------------| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:C}""{0:C}"|$12,345.68$12,345.68| |-12345.6789-12345.6789|"{0:C}""{0:C}"|($12,345.68)($12,345.68)| |1234512345|"{0:D}""{0:D}"|1234512345| |1234512345|"{0:D8}""{0:D8}"|0001234500012345| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:E}""{0:E}"|1234568E+0041234568E+004| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:E10}""{0:E10}"|1.2345678900E+0041.2345678900E+004| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:F}""{0:F}"|12345.6812345.68| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:F0}""{0:F0}"|1234612346| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:G}""{0:G}"|12345.678912345.6789| |123456789123456789|"{0:G7}""{0:G7}"|1.234568E81.234568E8| |12345.678912345.6789|"{0:N}""{0:N}"|12,345.6812,345.68| |123456789123456789|"{0:N4}""{0:N4}"|123,456,789.0000123,456,789.0000| |12345.678912345.6789|"总: {0: c}""Total: {0:C}"|总计: $ 12345.68Total: $12345.68| 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

[!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件执行任何必要的预呈现步骤之前保存的视图状态和呈现内容。它通常由控件开发人员在扩展类。This method notifies the server control to perform any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content .It is generally used by control developers when extending the class. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发往服务器之间更改列表控件中的选择时引发事件。The event is raised when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 列表控件必须保留某些信息发往此事件来正常工作的服务器之间的值。A list control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 请确保为列表控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for the list control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以显示用户所做的选择。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the selection made by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列表中选定项的最低序号索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the lowest ordinal index of the selected items in the list.

value.span: 列表中选定项的最低序号索引。

span.span: The lowest ordinal index of the selected items in the list.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未选定任何内容。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于确定列表中的当前选定项的索引，如果列表控件只允许一个选项。Use this property to determine the index of the currently selected item in the list if the list control allows only one selection. 如果列表控件支持多重选择，请使用此属性来确定所选项目的最小索引。If the list control supports multiple selections, use this property to determine the lowest index of the selected items. 值属性不特别是保存在回发时。The value of the property is not specifically saved on postback. 还原回发时使用属性。It is restored on postback using the property. 例如，如果属性是 4，在回发时，属性设置为的索引具有对象4 的属性。For example, if the property is 4, on postback, the property is set to the index of the object that has a property of 4. 如果多个对象具有（4) 中的第一个项的属性选择集合。If more than one object has a property of 4, the first item in the collection is selected. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以确定中选定项的最小索引。The following example demonstrates how to use to determine the lowest index of the selected items in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedIndex/CS/ListControlSelectedIndexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedIndex/VB/ListControlSelectedIndexvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 在呈现列表时，该索引已被设置为小于 -1 或大于、等于列表中项数的值。

span.span: The index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list at the time the list is rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 发往服务器之间更改列表控件中的选择时引发事件。The event is raised when the selection from the list control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 列表控件必须保留某些信息发往此事件来正常工作的服务器之间的值。A list control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 请确保为列表控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for the list control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以显示用户所做的选择。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the selection made by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取列表控件中索引最小的选定项。

span.span: Gets the selected item with the lowest index in the list control.

value.span: 从列表控件中选定的最小索引值项。

span.span: The lowest indexed item selected from the list control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果列表控件允许仅一次选择，请使用此属性来获取所选的项的各个属性。If the list control allows only a single selection, use this property to get the individual properties of the selected item. 如果列表控件允许多重选择，使用此属性来获取列表控件中选定的最低的索引项的属性。If the list control allows multiple selections, use this property to get the properties of the lowest indexed item selected from the list control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用若要获取当前选定项中的各个属性并以显示该项目和它的值。The following example demonstrates how to use to get the individual properties of the currently selected item in the and to display that item and its value. [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/CS/ListControlDataSourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlDataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDataSource/VB/ListControlDataSourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string SelectedValue { get; set; }
.property instance string SelectedValue
Public Overridable Property SelectedValue As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SelectedValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取列表控件中选定项的值，或选择列表控件中包含指定值的项。

span.span: Gets the value of the selected item in the list control, or selects the item in the list control that contains the specified value.

value.span: 列表控件中选定项的值。

span.span: The value of the selected item in the list control.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的所选属性。This property returns the property of the selected . 属性通常用于确定列表控件中的选定项的值。The property is commonly used to determine the value of the selected item in the list control. 如果选择了多个项，则返回索引最小的选定项的值。If multiple items are selected, the value of the selected item with the lowest index is returned. 如果未不选定任何项，空字符串 ("") 返回。If no item is selected, an empty string ("") is returned. 属性还可以用于通过设置项的值与列表控件中选择一个项。The property can also be used to select an item in the list control by setting it with the value of the item. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 当所选的值中的可用值列表并不执行回发，则引发异常。When the selected value is not in the list of available values and a postback is performed, an exception is thrown. 下面的示例演示如何在回发发生之前捕获的无效值：The following example shows how to catch an invalid value before postback occurs: ```vb Me.DropDownList1.Items.Add(New ListItem( Text="Hello", Value="1" )) If DropDownList1.Items.FindByValue("2") IsNot Nothing Then Response.Write("Found") End If ``` ```csharp this.DropDownList1.Items.Add(new ListItem{ Text="Hello", Value="1" }); if(DropDownList1.Items.FindByValue("2") != null) { Response.Write("Found"); } ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以选择中的项控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to select an item in a control. 请注意，此属性还可用于检索所选的项的值。Notice that this property can also be used to retrieve the value of the selected item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/CS/listcontrolselectedvaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ListControlSelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlSelectedValue/VB/listcontrolselectedvaluevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 选定值是不在可用值列表中，视图状态或其他状态已加载（已执行回发）。

span.span: The selected value is not in the list of available values and view state or other state has been loaded (a postback has been performed).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会获取和设置相同的值属性。The property gets and sets the same value that the property does. 属性通常用于确定值的中的选定项控件。The property is commonly used to determine the value of the selected item in the control. 如果未不选定任何项，空字符串 ("") 返回。If no item is selected, an empty string ("") is returned. 你还可以使用属性以选择中的项通过将其设置与项的值的控件。You can also use the property to select an item in the control by setting it with the value of the item. 如果中没有的项控件包含指定的值，引发异常。If no items in the control contain the specified value, an exception is thrown. 控件开发人员可以重写属性以支持与不相关的功能属性。Control developers can override the property to support features that are not related to the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: The group of controls for which the derived causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组从其他页上的验证组可以独立进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称派生自的控件类发回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control that is derived from the class causes validation when it posts back to the server. 属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定的值属性和属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void VerifyMultiSelect ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void VerifyMultiSelect() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub VerifyMultiSelect ()
protected public: virtual void VerifyMultiSelect();

summary.span: 确定列表控件是否支持多选模式。

span.span: Determines whether the list control supports multiselection mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不执行任何操作如果支持多选。The method does nothing if multiselection is supported. 否则，它会引发异常。Otherwise, it throws an exception.

span.span: is set to .
